title: NFL Draft Recap: NFC Winners & Losers + Rookie Decisions - Fantasy Football Podcast for 5/5
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Andy, Mike and Jason continue recapping the 2022 NFL Draft! Find out who the biggest winners and losers are for fantasy football from every NFC team! Plus, what are the tough decisions happening in Dynasty Rookie drafts so far? Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for May 5th, 2022.

The 2022 UDK is available for pre-order at UltimateDraftKit.com -- Get instant access to the Dynasty Pass with the UDK+

(02:55) - Tough Rookie Draft Decisions
(13:30) - NFC Winners & Losers
(14:10) - Detroit Lions
(18:45) - Chicago Bears
(21:15) - Minnesota Vikings
(23:20) - Green Bay Packers
(30:00) - Carolina Panthers
(31:35) - Atlanta Falcons
(37:30) - New Orleans Saints
(42:10) - Tampa Bay Buccaneers
(44:15) - New York Giants
(46:05) - Washington Commanders
(53:00) - Philadelphia Eagles
(54:10) - Dallas Cowboys
(55:50) - Seattle Seahawks
(59:35) - San Francisco 49ers
(01:02:05) - Arizona Cardinals
(01:05:20) - Los Angeles Rams
